name: Pouring Entry Details
query:
select 
    p.name AS 'ID', 
    cd.pattern AS 'Pattern Code', 
    p.heat_no AS 'Heat no', 
    p.heat_date AS 'Heat Date',
    cd.item_code AS 'Casting Item Code', 
    cd.item_name AS 'Casting Item Name', 
    p.total_consumed_weight AS 'Total Consumed Weight', 
    p.total_rr_weight AS 'Total RR Weight',
    p.total_pouring_weight AS 'Total Pouring Weight', 
    p.total_pouring_weight- p.total_rr_weight AS 'Casting Weight',
    cd.total_quantity AS 'Quantity Per Box', 
    p.normal_loss AS 'Normal Loss', 
    p.grade AS 'Select Grade', 
    p.supervisor_name AS 'Supervisor', 
    p.operator_name AS 'Operator', 
    p.contractor_name AS 'Contractor', 
    p.company AS 'Company Name'
from 
    `tabPouring` p
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCasting Details` cd on p.name = cd.parent
WHERE
    p.heat_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    p.heat_no
